title: 04/26/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 04/26/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin points out the teams ahead of the NFL draft that can improve the most based on making a big move to trade up. He thinks the Dolphins are making a mistake by sticking with Tua Tagovailoa as their franchise quarterback when they have the chance to take a star prospect in the draft. He also tells you why he was right about Baker Mayfield but wrong about Mike Tomlin. Plus, NFL insider Peter Schrager joins the show for the FINAL live mock draft of 2021! 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
